choose.when:
SELECT * FROM news WHERE eng = 1
and ( news_title LIKE '%${NKeyword}%' or news_content LIKE '%${NKeyword}%' )
ORDER BY news_date DESC
choose.otherwise:
SELECT * FROM news WHERE eng is null
and ( news_title LIKE '%${NKeyword}%' OR news_content LIKE '%${NKeyword}%' )
ORDER BY news_date DESC

mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM news ORDER BY news_date DESC
